info.author: DataShop@CMU datashop-help@lists.andrew.cmu.edu, MIT
info.abstract: The Row Remover component selects rows that you would like removed or kept within a data set.
info.description: This component allows you to remove or keep rows that meet certain criteria from a dataset.

ul.li: tab-delimited file: contains data to be modified.

info.outputs: Tab-delimited file contains data with rows removed or kept.

ul.li: What to Do with Rows: two options: remove selected rows, or keep selected rows and remove the rest
Column to Match: the column or variable that the values should be matched to
Remove or Keep Empty Values: work with empty values or not
Values to Remove: you can enter values that you want to remove or keep. Separate multiple values with commas.
